adDetails: Piano or voice lessons!!! VOICE LESSONS (ages 12 and up) Focus on proper vocal technique from a classical basis, diction, and music theory. PIANO LESSONS (ages 5 and up) Focus on proper technique, reading music, scales, music theory, and ear training. QUALIFICATONS -Bachelors of music in vocal performance from San Jose State University. -Associates of arts degree, with an emphasis in music from Yuba Community College. -Ten years experience teaching piano and voice and working with children. -Four years experience working as a piano accompanist and vocal coach for the voice studios of world-renowned opera singers Erie Mills and Joseph Frank at San Jose State University. -Sixteen years experience as a church accompanist, playing for First Reformed Church (Yuba City, Ca), First United Methodist (San Jose, Ca), St. Martin of Tours (San Jose, Ca), St. Frances Cabrini Parish (San Jose, Ca), and First Presbyterian Church (Hollister, Ca). -Accompanying experience, sectional leading, vocal coaching, and musical direction at local schools and community choirs, including; Yuba Community College, Lincoln High School, Leland High School, Gunderson High School, San Jose State University, and Oriana Chorale. -Trained in Italian, French, German, Spanish, Latin, and English diction. If you are interested in lessons, please contact me Rachel
